title: great location, lovely room, friendly staff
text:
i arrived in NYC for the coldest weekend of the winter (so far), after a 4 1/2 hour flight delay. i was cold & tired! after being greeted by the doorman, taken care of by the front desk and dinner suggestions from the bell captain, i was warm inside and out. everyone i met at The Beacon was so nice...they all smile when they see you come in or out.
what they say about new yorkers being unfriendly is absolutely untrue here.
the room was nice, the bed was AMAZING, the kitchenette was very nice to have -- and the thermostat worked perfectly. i can't imagine staying anywhere else when i need to be on the upper west side.
Room Tip: rooms in the back are quieter. See more room tips
